title: [Large-Scale] Evidence and Practice of Sports Drug Use

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pharmaceutical knowledge and understanding of pharmacokinetics
context.additional_context: Hybrid format combining smartphone-based mobile learning and offline workshops. Learners are practicing professionals, with content structured around immediately applicable workplace scenarios

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain international regulations (e.g., WADA Prohibited List) and domestic legal standards for sports drug use with over 80% accuracy.
Students can evaluate doping prevention strategies and drug testing procedures applied to real-world cases with over 70% accuracy.
Students understand the role of Athlete Support Personnel (ASP) and can create counseling guidelines to prevent drug misuse.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
